direction.raw_text: ! INTRUDER DETECTED!" (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's been another breech!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the Intruder again!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to abort!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We might not get another chance!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Sinclair pulls Meg's hand from the "abort" button and slams his hand on "DIGITIZE". BEAM ARRAY scans Rush's body, reducing it to bits - Meg worries - Sinclair dives for cover - PLASMA BALL engulfs Quantum Digitizer. FINAL BITS of Rush scan away. Plasma ball FRIES the unit.         Breakers trip.   Power fades. Meg and Sinclair come up to find: Quantum Digitizer:       In a smoking heap. Target chair:       Empty. 27   EXT.   CYBERSPACE TRANSITION Light-speed thrill-ride, hurling into digital chaos. Rush's electrified body hurtles across the void, eyes filled with TERROR and AWE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 28   EXT.   CYBERSPACE - X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Shimmering bits morph into an awesome cyberscape. Rush enters this bizarre world - CRASH/FLASH - stranger in a strange land. Data energy ZAPS off his body, interacting with the landscape circuitry around him. He fights it, tries to control it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ALARMS SOUNDING inside. He turns, looks up a FIREWALL. Hundreds of X-Takk Troops hurry to look down. FIRING WEAPONS. A FIGURE comes at him, down the wall, STREAKING RED. BLAMMO! TRON lands on a plateau above Rush, gazing down. They face each other, equally perplexed. Rush is no longer human, but not quite a program either. Energy zaps off his body, infusing the surrounding circuitry. Tron stares, unblinking - Cyber-Ninja.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's YOU!    The intruder! Rush's body circuits PULSE with anger - data surges out his feet, across floor circuitry, up to the plateau. Energy interacts with Tron's body circuits, siphoning off bits of code. Code races across Rush's eyes.        Identification data.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are...    TRON?!? X-Takks hustle onto the scene. Tron leaps off the plateau, cutting the data connection.      He whips his disk off his back and THROWS. Disk SLAMS Rush in the gut, knocks him flat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! X-Takks pursue Tron - Tron recovers his disk - vanishes in an OUTBOUND DATA STREAM, losing his pursuers. X-Takks pull Rush to his feet, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...    You crashed irrecoverably!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, well, I'm not exactly -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: has been rebooted!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reboot was not authorized! Pushing through Police: A sleek, smart cyber-babe MEGA. (She's Meg's cyber-twin: Twice the edge, half the patience, all the curves.) Rush is awed by the sight of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yow.     I know who programmed you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Mega, X-Net Intelligence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega.     Cool.     I am -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A spy? Posing as RX23? Under which register were you rebooted?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a User. Mega and X-Takks look at him like he's crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detain this impostor. X-Takks move to seize Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No wait, look. We're on the same side here. I got an ID on the intruder! Mega touches Rush, exciting his energy flow.        She reads data streaming in his eyes - TRON'S ID info.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Tron"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did he get that?? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor must know of this! 29   EXT.   CENTRAL CONTROL SERVER Mega and X-Takks escort Rush across bridges, in security portals. Firewalls cool and part, allowing them to pass. Down a grand corridor, past towering energy columns and throbbing green memory banks. They cross a bridge. View includes: Vast square concentric security rings surround a massive cubic POWER SUPPLY CORE. 30   INT.   PLEXOR CPU Plexor toils over the latest security breech, failing to decipher recordings of the Intruder. Rush is brought in buy Mega.      He double-takes on Plexor, the cyber-twin of Sinclair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor.   This is the one. Plexor steps closer, scanning Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are not RX23.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Rush. I'm a - Look, I got an ID on the Intruder. Do you know the program they used to call Tron? Plexor activates memory banks. Accesses archive files of the original low-rez Tron: So harmless, so many years ago. Bears little resemblance to the upgraded Tron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in error. Zero match.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly. That's how he's getting past you. You don't see him for what he is. He's one of your own, gone bad. Tron was a crude security program from Encom's old days. Strictly low-rez, right? Archived and forgotten. But his source code contains all the architecture of every Encom system, including X-net. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's why some smart User dusted him off and upgraded him -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "User"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People. Like me. From the outside. People who write all of your instructions. Plexor and Mega trade a look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He displays random instability.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Users do not exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we contact Sinclair?    He'll explain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Define "Sinclair".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know? Oh geez. There must be a way to link him into this. Rush touches Plexor's command console, but his energy OVERLOADS the system - X-Takks pull Rush away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zero match for a "Sinclair".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's your boss. Everybody's boss. Outside, in the real world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Assuming the existence of a world beyond this, is a fatal error.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor issues all commands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grep grep. Rush considers his predicament. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Sorry. I'm a program, guess I got a piece of my code corrupted. Whatever it is, it's given me power over Tron. (to X-Takks and Mega) They saw me read his circuits. Can any other program do that? Plexor looks to Mega.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He creates alternative data channels at will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chaos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm a little unstable.    But I can find Tron for you. Plexor processes.     His eyes stream barcode data to X-Takks:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Release him. X-Takk Troops read Plexor's barcode command with their eyes. They let go of Rush. Plexor turns to Mega.       Issues more barcode.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Interface with this one. Exploit his ability. Locate the program "Tron" and destroy him on sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instructions received, Plexor. Mega exits with Rush.       Plexor's gaze lingers on Rush. 31   EXT.   CENTRAL CONTROL SERVER Security PORTAL opens. Ultra sleek STRAITHE vehicle glides out, accesses a shiny new, EMPTY X-NET DATA OPTIK HIGHWAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to find a program called KROD. He's a specialist in pattern recognition. He snagged the last known position on Tron for me. Mega scans data, gets a fix on "KROD".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a waste of X-Net resources. You're strictly random. We will never find the intruder this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor ordered us to work together. You can't doubt his instructions, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course not. But I am programmed to predict all possible errors. You contain an infinite quantity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meg for sure programmed you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no data on "Meg".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never mind.    I'm being random. Mega speeds along empty X-Net OPTIK HIGHWAY. Wide, secure, newly constructed. High above the tangle of chaotic, clogged OLD DATA ARTERIES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: X-Net is amazing. It's going to change everything. Unless one rogue program called Tron brings it down. Do you believe he could?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I calculated the probability. (soberly) He could crash it all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So we're working together on this? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As instructed, I will interface. Mega pulls STRAITHE into: 33   INT.   X-NET SWITCHING NEXUS/HUB CITY Construction nearly complete.       High security. Mega leads Rush to secured encryption gates.         Her eyes light with data, the gate opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The program "KROD" is over there. Across a bridge: An old-network HUB CITY. Like Hong Kong in wilder days. Jammed with Programs, colorful data, loud data transfer screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a dump. He heads across, but Mega hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey.    Interface. Mega grudgingly follows.       Portal closes. 34   EXT.   HUB CITY Electro-pop overload. Rush and Mega squeeze through crowds, past screaming data pipes and sizzling circuitry. City is dominated by mugshots of TRON:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : Rush stands, beholds the place. Looks at his hands and arms, clad in circuitry. He finds he had landed outside: Fortress-like X-NET CENTRAL SERVER.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .   STRAITHE VEHICLE - RACING DOWN X-NET OPTIK HIGHWAY Mega at the controls.    Rush rides, beholding the lightshow wonder of Cyberspace.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Mega locates a gleaming X-NET KIOSK. A PROMOTER (KROD) extoles the virtues of the X-Net system:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three more hub cities have been attacked by viruses! (crowd gets scared) But X-Net opens soon! You will travel in total security! Crowd buzzes.       They can't wait.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the one you seek? Rush approaches Krod. Looks like Miles Rabbish.           There's a bizarre moment of recognition between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gotta be -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Krod!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Krod!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah -     Heeey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The best pattern recognition program ever. (to Mega) This guy can filter a river of junk data and pull out the good stuff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know it, dude! Krod smiles big at Mega, refers to Rush:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is this guy? Rush pulls Krod aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miles - I mean Krod, you flew the search engine. You ran a trace on a hotshot lightcycle rider. The red guy. Remember?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well. Eh. I'd like to help you, but truth is, I just got rebooted from a big crash. There's nothing left in my memory from before. He taps his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This will yield zero.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on. Rush thinks, touches a surface. Concentrates. Circuitry zaps from data coming off his hands. Connections illuminate, data races around walls and floors. Programs stop what they're doing, amazed by the feat. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember, Krod? You were watching this lightcycle duel, a red guy and a green guy, head-to-head. Krod gawks at the image, but he's stumped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The green guy faked out the red guy, but the red guy double-faked the green guy. Bingo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay! YES! And the green guy splattered big time! It was awesome! How could I forget that?! Splat happens in Rush's memory image.        All goes white.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did the red guy go after that? You didn't crash right away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He escaped out this hidden exit - Krod's points to another screen.        "Wanted" image of Tron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !   The RED GUY!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you jack his coordinate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tr165444.018! They slap high fives.     Krod double-takes on Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the green guy was YOU! You got rebooted?! They called you, um - Don't tell me, I got it, eh -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call me Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! Whatever. You're good. How'd you do that thing with your hands?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's complicated. You're coming with us to the old game grid. We're going to find Tron and shut him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beats working. They head out.      Krod falls in beside Mega, impressed by her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey babe.   Did I ever know you? 35   EXT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM I/O PORT Rush, Krod and Mega head deep into an obsolete, abandoned region of low-rez circuitry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The old game grid is this way - He spins. Rush and Mega aren't behind him. They've climbed inside a defunct I/O Port: Like a retro-tech temple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I uplink to the real world?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The real world doesn't exist. Nobody can uplink. These ports were for simulation only.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right... But how did those poor misguided fools boot up the link?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They stood in the center.   Held their disk above their head. Rush pulls his disk off his back, aims it skyward. Concentrates. Energy flows off his feet, interacts with the I/O Port floor. RUBY COMMUNICATION BEAM shoots skyward. 36   INT.   REAL WORLD - SINCLAIR'S OFFICE - DAY Kelter and Phlegman report to Sinclair: (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Intruder attempted another break-in. We patched the firewall, but our manpower getting is maxed out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay on it!    Nobody sleeps! Guys hustle out.    Sinclair wheels, as Meg storms in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a message on your secure link! Sinclair enters retinal ID.      Text forms: INTRUDER IDENTIFIED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is this coming from - ? Meg hurries to the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's HIM. Text appears:    I AM RUSH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My God, he's there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush, it's Sinclair and Meg. Her words transform into text. 37   EXT.   CYBERSPACE - ANCIENT I/O PORT Rush raises his disk, beaming data into the great unknown. Smiles as he downloads the response. Mega and Krod watch nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I identified the intruder. I/O PORT walls ZAP ENERGY, STRESSING Rush's CONNECTION - 38   INT.   REAL WORLD - SINCLAIR'S OFFICE - DAY Text appears: INTRUDER IS UPGRADED VERSION OF TRON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tron? Wasn't Tron one of our programs? Sinclair and Meg trade baffled looks. 39   INT.   CYBERSPACE - X-NET NEXUS Plexor oversees construction.     X-Takk Commander points to something in the distance. Beyond the horizon, the RUBY RED BEAM reaches to the heavens. Plexor sees it, alarmed. 40   EXT.   CYBERSPACE - ANCIENT I/O PORT - MORNING Text forms in magenta circuitry - GOOD WORK PARTNER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a plan to crash Tron. Mega turns with alarm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Walls THUNDER and CRASH IN - Rush leaps clear with his disk - MASSIVE ROMBALL (data reformatting orb) hurtles around the I/O Port, ZAPPING all it touches, de-rezzing data structures into neutral gray "blank matter". ROMBALL loops skyward. GIANT D-REZZ PROGRAM crashes down from above, retrieves ROMBALL - He's ENORMOUS, TOUGH, SINGLE-MINDED. 41   INT.   ENCOM CORPORATION - SINCLAIR'S OFFICE - DAY Sinclair and Meg hang on the broken transmission:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush? Words appear:    END OF LINE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'd better not fail.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: :    (2) Mega is astonished - and privately worried. Rush's data flow illuminates surfaces with images from HIS memory - the opening light cycle race.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: INTRUDER IS UPGRADED VERSION OF TRON

dialogue.raw_text: .   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM I/O PORT D-Rezz screams like a modem, hurls ROMBALL - Mega and Krod dive clear - ROMBALL misses them, but BLAZES DOWN two more I/O Ports.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: rezz retrieves ROMBALL, bears down on Mega and Krod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Double points if you nail me! Bring it on! D-Rezz turns his ugly sights on Rush, baited away from Mega and Krod. D-rezz flexes and ROARS, revealing an X-NET LOGO on his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop!    End your routine! D-rezz corners Rush, hurls his ROMBALL - Ball fires every circuit in its path, bleaching away data energy. Rush dodges -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cease!    Desist! We're on the same team! Mega throws her disk, plings D-rezz on the skull.      D-rezz turns on her - Rush runs, LEAPS on D-Rezz's back.      Like riding a gorilla - D-Rezz flips Rush to the ground, pins him with one mighty hand, raises his ROMBALL for the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm X-Net too! Data flows from Rush's body, up D-Rezz's clamping arm. Radiant energy between predator and prey. Digits race in D-rezz's eyes. A code unlocks. He looks down, finally registering the X-Net markings on Rush's outfit. D-Rezz lets go of Rush, slumps back on his haunches.       Lowers his head in shame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, hey, hey big guy, don't take it so hard. We all have bad days. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was carrying out his programming. All I/O Ports are scheduled for de- rezz. D-rezz hears this, happy to be understood.       (He never talks.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy, big guy. No harm, no foul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: D-Rezz, we can use a guy with your raw power. You ready to be a hero for X-Net? D-Rezz stands, clutches his ROMBALL.       Reporting for duty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool. Now I've got somebody I can boss around. D-rezz modem-growls at Krod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get to the game grid. Rush leads them up an incline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a skill for manipulating other programs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When do I get a shot at hacking your code?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never. Our operating systems are incompatible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You act like I've got a virus. They come to a spectacular vista of the OLD GAME GRID.       Low resolution, uncool, largely forgotten. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The place we nail Tron. 43   EXT.    GAME PORTAL OUTPOST Obsolete, abandoned computer game entry portal, guarding entry to the old game grid beyond. An electro-tech carnival zone gone dark. No life in sight... Then: Beam of DATA ENERGY sling-shots at ground level, solidifying to become: A slender, jumpy Program called I-BEEM. He wears the X-Net logo and a cracked disk on his back. He's highly unstable and way unplugged from the system (like one of those Japanese soldiers still fighting alone in the hills 10 years after WWII was over). I-Beem sees something - he PANICS, zapping away in characteristic streaks of airborne data. He reassembles in a hiding place, skittish, observing: Rush, Mega, Krod and D-Rezz arrive. See GIANT PILE of GAME VEHICLE PARTS blocking access to the grid. Rush picks up an old LIGHT WAND.       Krod finds one too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: D-rezz.   Cut a path. D-Rezz hurls his Romball, ZAPS into VEHICLE PARTS.       A dent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's good.     Keep doing it. D-rezz retrieves Romball for another whack - ZAP -    DATA ENERGY BEAM snaps in front of them, becoming I- Beem.    He grips his rickety disk, challenging them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Violation!   Go away!   Access denied!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax, buddy - Mega scans I-beem.     He freaks, drops his disk, grabs for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pound him to bits, D-rezz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's wireless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Freaky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Searching data bank. "I-Beem". Security Specialist, damaged in service, rated unstable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Unstable"! Like they aren't?! They booted me off X-Net! I'll show them! I'm doing my subroutine out here! Nobody gets through this portal! He kicks parts - avalanche fills the gap D-rezz blasted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: D-rezz, take out this blip. D-rezz cocks Romball. I-Beem freaks, sling-shots all over the place via his data beam, tossing his wobbly disk. Rush catches I-Beem's disk.       Holds off D-Rezz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on. I-Beem. We're from X-Net
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . You're doing a great job out here. Everybody knows it. Mega throws Rush a look.    I-beem comes up, grateful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They do?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. Now, have you seen a rogue Program around here? He's red. Super fast. Known as "Tron". Data zags to Rush, forming into: I-Beem.       Wide-eyed. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The red one! That illegal function! He blasts through here and JUMPS OVER THE TOP! I tell him access denied - he JUMPS RIGHT OVER like I was never there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When did he come through last?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right before you got here. Rush trades looks with Mega, Krod and D-Rezz.       Trail is hot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I-beem, we've got a plan to shut down that red violator. You're going to help us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me at him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First, you've got to let us onto the game grid. I-Beem stiffens, reflexively vigilant. He scans the four of them again, finally softening. He zaps to a wall near his giant barrier, then proudly pushes aside a thin panel. Beyond a corridor of game gear, view expanses to reveal: 44   EXT.   OLD GAME GRID Rush steps across the vast vector-graphic grid surface. Eerie.   Quiet.     Pure. Mega, I-Beem, Krod and D-rezz follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This region is obsolete. Rush kneels, touches grid lines.    Circuits energize, as his energy surges in all directions.    He draws in data.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's bits of Tron's code all over. Krod, give D-Rezz and I-beem the escape coordinate Tron used on me. Krod's eyes flash data to I-Beem and D-rezz.      "Tr165444.018". (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coordinate captured. D-Rezz nods, palming his Romball.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's where Tron will bail out. We'll make sure he needs to. Go set up the trap. (to D-rezz) You only get one shot at this, big guy. Stop him but don't destroy him, right? He's got data I need. D-rezz grips Romball, grunts affirmation.    He and I-beem head for the perimeter of the grid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If this is Tron's territory, he'll know we're here. He'll hide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can't resist a grudge match. He'll take risks trying to beat me. That's how we trip him up. (to Krod) Whip it out. Rush unsheathes his LIGHT WAND. Krod pulls out his own LIGHT WAND. They both look at Mega. She's got no light wand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't bring one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, not a problem - Krod holds his light wand forward, activates it.    LIGHT CYCLE up-rezzes under him. He revs it, ready to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Hop on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on, Krod. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I upgraded my unit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are awesome, man.    I hate you. Mega considers. There's more on her mind she's not talking about. She smiles at Rush, climbs on back of his light cycle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmmm...   Hack me. A nod between Rush and Rush - they TAKE OFF. LIGHT CYCLES shoot across grid surface. Mega screams and clutches Rush, throwing her body against his, clamping her arms around him. Krod and Rush turn 90 degrees, rallying, passing each other, getting warmed up. It's familiar territory. Light cycles race toward each other on the same line. Mega holds Rush tight, eyes filling with terror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Resource conflict!    Fatal crash imminent! But Krod and Rush slow their light cycles with expert skill, rolling safely to a halt, nose-to-nose. Directly over: A BIG RED DOT.      The only dot on the grid. Grid Center. Mega, Rush and Krod raise up to scan the horizon.        It's all clear flat grid to the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any sign of him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything looks the same to me. Everything looks the same. The same. The same.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Krod, snap out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tron will never expose himself. They watch, wait, pivot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The same... 45   EXT.   EDGE OF GAME GRID D-rezz and I-beem search grid edge, along the rocky boundary. I-beem zaps himself further along, finding: Glowing code numbers mark the end of each grid line. D-rezz grunts, points.      One lights up "Tr165444.018" They follow the line off the grid, where it leads into a narrow rocky pass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I see. Perfect trap. This is going to be good. Climb, climb! 46   EXT.   GAME GRID / CENTER SPOT Rush, Mega and Krod wait on their light cycles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its futile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look. SPECK moves on the horizon, turns a corner, stays on the horizon. Another corner. It's a light cycle, making a huge box around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember the plan, Krod. Don't bail out until the last millisecond. Lightcycle turns toward them, coming fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on tight, Mega. Mega hugs Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmmm. They SPEED AWAY. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tron turns to follow, coming alongside. Krod runs interference, cuts sharp in front of Tron. It's a high-stakes speed-chase, narrowly missing side walls and rock outcroppings. 47   EXT.   EDGE OF GAME GRID I-beem zaps onto the grid, tracks horizon dots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here they come! He zaps back to the edge, signals upward. D-rezz straddles the rock passage above, ready to hurl his Romball. 48   EXT.   GAME GRID Tron takes the lead in a three-way heat.      Revs to breath- taking speed. Rush and Krod gain, coming up on either side of Tron. Tron looks to each opponent.      His eyes lock on Mega. Mega stares into Tron's cold eyes, almost like she's trying to signal him. But Tron returns his gaze forward, as the ROCKY EDGE looms closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wuss!   You call that speed!? Rush kicks in a hyper-burner, surging forward.      Krod does the same. Tron responds with more speed. Rush and Krod have Tron sandwiched, heading for the rock edge. Tron pulls ahead, aiming for the hidden crevasse. Mega worries.    Clings to Rush. 49   EXT.   EDGE OF GAME GRID D-rezz, astride the crevasse, sees light cycles speeding his way. He's got the Rom-ball poised to intercept Tron. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, what are you - ?? Tron sees the bail-out, knows something's wrong. He looks ahead, sees D-rezz astride his crevasse escape root, rom- ball poised in the air. Tron bails out 90 degrees, cutting behind Krod.       Krod turns twice, ending up in Tron's lane. To the side, Rush's light cycle screams toward solid rock, vibrating out of control. Rush grabs Mega and JUMPS OFF.       They slide on the grid, holding each other. Krod's lightcycle heads for the rock escape passage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!   It's ME! Rush and Mega slide to a halt, in time to see: Their light cycle SMASHES rocks, explodes in a million bits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: D-rezz is ready to smash him with his Romball.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!   It's Krod! Tron is OVER THERE! D-rezz makes mental switch, hurls Romball. Romball bounces down solid rock, onto game grid, rolls with ferocious speed, DIAGONALLY across the grid. Romball curves to track Tron - like a great bowling shot. Romball clips rear wheel of Tron's lightcycle.       Lightcycle vaporizes. Tron skids and tumbles. I-beem zaps beside Rush and Mega.       Krod and D-rezz join them. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There he goes! Tron climbs over rocks, escaping through a TUNNEL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got him now.    Let's go! WHOOSH! Electro-fire Romball careens across grid, bearing down on them. Group DIVES CLEAR. D-rezz swings in a foot, stopping the Romball - inches short of mowing down Krod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could have done that. He strobes, freezes, hits the deck. 50   INT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM TUNNEL Stalking their prey:       Rush, Krod, I-beem and D-rezz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't go any further. Ahead, vast old circuitry has been "eaten through" by dull throbbing greenish MEMORY LEAKAGE. Paths of unaffected material are narrow and maze-like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't ask, dude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a memory leak, once it starts, it infects everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Touch it and you crash forever.     We cannot risk it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I agree. D-rezz grunts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then it's settled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. Listen to me. You might not believe there's a world outside of this one, but let's just say a guy named Sinclair is depending on me. If Tron got through here, then I can too. Who's with me? D-rezz steps forward, then I-Beem.      Shamed, Krod joins them. Finally, Mega makes it unanimous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. I-beem, take D-rezz, see what's up ahead. We'll guard this portal until you come back. I-beem and D-rezz buddy up and depart on a recon mission. Krod pulls off his disk, nervously practices boomerang throws.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better show me how to use mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem. It's all in the velocity- vector ratio. Rush pulls the disk off his own back.      He throws - disk flies wild - he runs to retrieve it. Mega retreats to a side area, partially eroded by memory leakage. She finds the remnants of COM CIRCUITRY and stares data beams into its transducer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 51   EXT.   X-NET NEXUS UNDER CONSTRUCTION - PLEXOR'S VEHICLE Plexor's vehicle circuitry forms image of Mega.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Report.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We interfaced with Tron.   He escaped into a dark zone. 52   INT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM TUNNEL Around a corner, Rush comes to retrieve his disk.       He pauses to eavesdrop on Mega's communication: (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Random One has proven effective?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is all glitches and bad data. He virtually got us de-rezzed. I recommend we terminate this mission. Rush listens, hurt and angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Proceed. If you keep Tron on the run, he cannot attack X-Net.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a poor allocation of resources.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have your instructions. Circuits go dark.    Mega turns, running smack into:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "All glitches and bad data." What's up with you? Ever since I got here, you've been working against me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I act as Plexor programs me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blah blah blah. You've got you own processor. I can feel it working overtime. Did Meg program you to mess with me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no match for "Meg" -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First, you don't want to come with me, then you're all over me on the light cycle - so you can dump us over and blow the plan. We would have nailed Tron by now if it wasn't for you. What's your malfunction?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't troubleshoot me! Angry silence.    Eyes locked. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The most effective alternative is to return to the main CPU and anticipate Tron's next attack. She moves to exit past him.        He snags her arm, pulls her back and KISSES HER. Energy ZAPS between them, racing through their body circuits. Rush downloads the spiky sensation.        Mega remains cold and bewildered. Outside, Krod tosses his disk, moving to track as it arcs through the air. He notices Rush and Mega kissing. Digs it vicariously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ram hog! His disk clunks him on the head. Mega breaks the kiss, backing off, conflicted.        Arcs of energy stretch between them, then snap loose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's what I'm programmed to do. Mega tries to ignore the kiss.        She exits past the guys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you doing with her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. She had a glitch.      I was just pinging her EPROM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She let you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a way through! Rush, Krod and Mega hurry to see: I-beem zap-zap-zaps toward them, scared to death -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tron attacked us! D-rezz has him cornered! Rush stows his disk on his back -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got him now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Akakakaka -    Agggggggg - Sounds like a modem, but it's a BATTLE-CRY. Rush comes to a point above - and cut off from - the fight. D-rezz advances along a narrow gantry, spinning his Romball, ready to hurl at: TRON. Tron flips over memory leakage, gains position and throws his disk - Disk HITS D-rezz. Plasma-ball GASH, but D-rezz is tough. He takes the damage, cocks his Romball -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys!   Go around - behind Tron! Rush darts down to help D-rezz. Mega, Rush hurry ahead.     I- beem zaps, zags and reforms, scared out of his mind. D-rezz hurls his Romball - Romball pings off two walls, comes at Tron from behind. Tron spins - milliseconds to spare - and flips clear. Retrieves his disk on the way down. Romball slams off a wall, heads back to D-rezz, but Tron's disk HITS IT, knocking it off course. D-rezz dives for ROMBALL - but it falls into the memory leak and FRIES TO BITS. Tron plants for a clear shot at D-rezz. Rush JUMPS down from above, right in front of D-rezz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ouch! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!   Pick on somebody your own size! D-rezz is twice as big as either of them. Tron's eyes are cold, lifeless, calculating.       Scanning his new opponent without success.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got no data on me. Rush pulls his disk off his back, poised for a duel. Tron moves with calculation, grips his hyper-etched disk. Circling his prey. Throws again - BRRANGG - Rush DUCKS - Tron's disk slams D-rezz.     D-rezz tries to catch the disk, but he's just too slow. Rush throws his disk. Beginner's luck - it banks off a wall and nearly smacks Tron. Rush snags it on the way back, before it tumbles into memory leakage. Tron jumps up two levels.     Retrieves his disk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: D-rezz, pull me up! D-rezz hoists Rush up.     Fingers grab upper deck. Tron jockeys for position.     Throws disk - Disk strikes D-rezz in the ribs.     Blast damage. D-rezz loses footing. Rush grabs upper level. D-rezz slips toward memory leakage. Rush grabs D-rezz's hand - he weighs a ton. Mega, Krod and I-beem can't get here to help -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on, man! HANG ON! But D-rezz's big hand slips out of Rush's. D-rezz PLUMMETS into memory leakage, zapping away in a blaze of glory -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He comes to his feet, facing Tron.       Determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know who you are. Encom security program Tr856 - TRON! Tron pauses.    Processes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is your User?? Tron glitches at the question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who programmed you?? I know your encryption code. Tell me your User or I shut you down. Tron throws his disk. Rush dodges. He sends waves of data energy through floor circuits, reaching into Tron's body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can shut you down with a nine digit code. WHO IS YOUR USER?? 392 - Tron's body animates painfully, as the first three code digits click into place. Tron FLIPS away, breaking contact with floor.        Data transfer stops. Tron steals away through a tunnel. Rush pursues. Krod, Mega and I-beem clamber for a way to follow. 54   INT.   OBSOLETE COMPUTER GAME ARENA Circular, riddled with memory leaks. Rush hurries to the center.       No sign of Tron. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me, Tron! Who programmed you? Here's your encryption code! 3-6-2- 6-6-8 - Rush sends data coursing into floor circuits. It radiates up walls, across bridges... And finds TRON in hiding. Data races into Tron's body. Six code numbers engage; he glitches. He LEAPS to breaks the contact, flinging his disk - Tron's disk SLAMS Rush.       Rush tumbles off a ledge, dangling over a memory leak. Tron pounces in.    Snags his disk. Tron steps on Rush's hand.         Pain energy jolts Rush's circuits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !    3-6-2-6-6-8-7 - Rush slips, grabs a slim protrusion.         Feet zapping an inch from the memory leakage. Tron throws his disk for a final time.         It arcs wide, coming around directly at Rush. Tron leans down, gazing into Rush's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Burst of SEARING DATA surges off Rush's hands, radiating up circuitry, loading into Tron's body. All nine code numbers LOCK in. Tron's body seizes. He fights the data intrusion, but his circuits sequentially SHUT DOWN. Tron's airborne disk wobbles and darkens. Tron tumbles off the edge, plummets past Rush. Disk misses Rush, skates into darkness. Mega, Krod and I-beem hurry in and see: Rush, climbing to safety. And below: Tron's body slips into the memory leakage, zapping away to bits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Game over, dude.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You crashed him! Rush gazes off the precipice. Remains of Tron is consumed by the swamp of memory leakage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's more than I wanted. Now I'll never know who his User is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're heroes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will be upgraded!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll give us a slot in the main server!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will be upgraded!   I will be - Krod slams him, makes him stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush, now you can finish pinging Mega's EPROM! Rush looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is Mega?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was just here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right behind me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ?? Rush searches. He finds Tron's disk, picks it up.     It's dark and lifeless, circuits gray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coming fast.    Electro-metallic footsteps. Rush, Krod and I-beem bunch together and pivot. Black-clad FINITY FIGHTERS appear, blocking all exits.            Disks ready for attack. Rush double-takes on faces among them: QUANTZ, tall silent, hardcore (looks like real-world Phlegman) And BOOLE, rotund, seen it all (like real-world Kelter).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I recognize... Trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're scanning us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I-beem, go for help.      Zap your butt out of here. But I-beem freezes, terrified.         Fighters tighten perimeter. A hush.   Footsteps.      Clunk-zap...    Clunk-zap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It had to happen. But why now of all times? Rush and Krod turn.       Fighters defer to: A DARK FIGURE, limping forward, one leg badly deformed by data corruption.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: User shows up. Rush is surprised, then pleased.         Somebody finally gets it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm a User. A superior being. The first to enter this realm. And you are - ? Figure's circuitry lights.         Finally, we see the face... It is FLYNN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn.   How can you be here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know this dude?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, he's a lunatic! I-beem panics, zaps away in an energy beam. He reforms further along for a "breath", then zaps further away. Three FINITY FIGHTERS chase him. Rush is amazed to find him self in the presence of Encom's former leader. Flynn comes closer, recognizing Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush Nortebi. I remember hiring you. They are equally dumbfounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody tipped these guys off about us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not soon enough. Fighters step aside, Mega enters, furious at Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You weren't supposed to beat Tron. I thought for sure he'd finish you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You destroyed our last hope!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I detect a pattern in her behavior.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a spy. Mega and Rush ooze mutual contempt.    Rush turns on Flynn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No wonder I couldn't figure it out. I assumed Tron User was on the outside! If I'd known this, I would blown past him and come straight for you. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I failed our cause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did everything you could. They know each other well. Rush registers jealousy, but larger concerns prevail:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn never died... (dawning) Because your Quantum Digitizer worked. That's how you got here... I know - that's how I got here too. Flynn studies Rush, anger rising.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The day after I hired you, you start sucking up to Sinclair. You thought I didn't know. Bet he offered your a partnership for this, right? You have no idea the damage you've done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm only getting started. Man, you were the company joke. Now I see why. You melted down your lab to take this little joyride. You got stuck here so all you can do is wreck other people's hard work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open your eyes, geek. My lab was rigged. My "death" was no accident. I pushed the button just in time to escape... Almost in time. He indicates his deformed leg.     Mega, Krod and the others listen with awed bewilderment.     These two guys speak of a world unknown to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're paranoid. Who would want you dead? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The same guy I programmed Tron to shut down. Same one you've been sucking up to. Sinclair. And his cyber-henchman, Plexor. Malicious grumbles from Fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too many of your brain cells have gotten zapped in here, old man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush, you lamer! You've been working for the bad guy. Three Fighters return from the I-beem pursuit.      Empty-handed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He got away. Flynn scowls at Rush. Sin number two.       Flynn slips Tron's dead disk in a special case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's move. X-Net goons will soon be all over this place. 55   EXT.   GAME GRID Energy zaps across grid, forming into I-beem. He's on the run, de-rezzing, zapping, reforming, bolting for: 56   EXT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM -      DEMOLISHED I/O PORTS I-beem de-rezzes, reforms, zaps himself toward the nearest X- Net OPTIK HIGHWAY. 57   EXT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM Fighters thread secret buffers and gates.      Flynn carries Tron's disk, helped along by Mega. Rush and Krod are held prisoner, prodded by Quantz and Boole. They cross a DATA BRIDGE, drawn to the sounds of SHREIKING PANIC.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hired Sinclair as Encom's business guy, so I could do the dreaming. Right off, he wanted to "capture the market" on data transmission. Had this plan called "X-Net", based on flawless efficiency, hyperlock security, encryption protocol uniformity. Blah blah. I was the boss, I told him to forget it. I knew it could go bad. But the guy had trouble taking no for an answer. He arranged for my lab to melt down. Sinclair took over my company and put X-Net on a fast-track. And here's where it's brought us. City descends into panic. X-Takk Troops evict Programs, seize prisoners and mercilessly hunt down resistors. X-Net Construction Crews build the Optik Highway with relentless precision, blasting aside the old city's splendid structures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are they doing??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beating the competition. X-Takk Troops storm closer - by the hundreds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've got us outnumbered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got to choose our battles wisely. This way! He leads them down a secret portal, into:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush, why is X-Net doing this?! A Kid Program runs to this Captured Father Program.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!   Let my daddy go! X-Takks haul Kid Program clear, then BLAST the Captives with de-rezz weapons. Captives glitch, thrash and expire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long has this been going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For years. 60   EXT.   REAL WORLD CITY - DUSK Like any other day. Except a high-rise building's lights flicker off. A subway escalator stops. A traffic light turns red on both sides. Cars honk, tempers flare. A TV store: All TVs in the window flip to one channel, which happens to be running a commercial for X-Net - theme: Total Data Security". 61   INT.   CYBERSPACE - SECRET X-NET PROCESSOR X-Takk Troops line up more Captive Programs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sinclair never told us about this. X-Net is creating the very terror that makes people want the security of X-net!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more glitches, freeze-ups or shut- downs. Once X-Net is open, Plexor will destroy all other systems. All data flow will be controlled by his Master User - (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sinclair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All data flow - Sinclair's to control and abuse. Bank accounts, medical histories, your Blockbuster account, your buying patterns, your e-mail. And to think, Rush - all this time, you've been working 24/7, trying to impress a him. X-Takk troops blast Captive Programs. 62   EXT.   REAL WORLD - BANK - DUSK ATM machine goes berserk. 63   EXT.   REAL WORLD - STREET - DUSK Block full of Pedestrians suddenly - and simultaneously - can't get their cell phones to work. 64   INT.   /EXT.   REAL WORLD - SUV MOVING - DUSK GPS navigation system map flips around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turn left now. Turn right now. Left. Right. NOW! SUV Driver panics, pulls a hard turn and SMASHES a BUS. 65   CYBERSPACE - SECRET X-NET PROCESSOR RUSH Sinclair betrayed me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finally you get it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tron was our late hope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got to stop this! X-Takks hear Rush's shouts.     An overwhelming force. Flynn and Mega shove Rush into a tunnel, closing the portal -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush was trying to expose us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They didn't see us.   Keep moving! Mega, Boole and Quantz move along, shoving Krod and Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got to tell people on the outside -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor shut down all the I/O ports. Only HE communicates with the outside. Sinclair holds all the cards. Flynn turns on Rush - one of Sinclair's cards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you get here?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Megan Randall sent me. (points out Mega) Her User. She fixed your lab and sent me here to take out Tron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Megan Randall? I remember her. Smart, wise beyond her years. I can't believe she'd fall for Sinclair's lies. He glances at Mega, then shoves Rush along. 67   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT Flynn, Mega, Fighters bring Rush and Krod into the clandestine Fighter base. Like a wartime casualty center, with corrupted Fighter Programs lining corridors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try to attack Plexor head-on, this is what happens. Because of you, there will be millions more. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lock up these two. We'll hold them for ransom. Or use them for target practice. Flynn and Mega turn to go.      Boole and Quantz use PROD LANCES to herd Rush and Krod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn. You think I'm Sinclair's flunky, but I'm not. Flynn pauses.    Rush speaks low, so X-Net Captives can't hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry about Tron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, we're - Sorry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were just doing a job, we had no way of knowing the truth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn, I was wrong about you. You've been doing the right thing in here. Plexor has to be shut down. Sinclair has to be exposed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like he said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Krod and I are ready to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are? Flynn puzzles over Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega, what do you read in him? Mega circles Rush, scanning his circuits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Independent operating instructions. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He will act as necessary to increase probability of his own survival.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He cannot to be trusted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust?! You're the one who's been lying to me the whole time! Rush points a finger at Mega - BOLT of ATTRACTION ENERGY shoots off his finger, ZAPS her on the nose. Mega's circuits OVERLOAD, she flies back - Rush, startled, looks at his finger. Fighters muscle Rush and Krod away. Flynn holds Mega, anger re-ignited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega's been risking her existence for our cause, lamer. That's more than you'll ever do. (to Fighters) Lock them away! Fighters toss Rush and Krod in the JAIL BLOCK with the BIG X- TAKK soldiers. Does finger-signs, body circuit language.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo, s'up?     Eh... X-Net rules, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Krod...     Shut down. Rush peers out of his cage, watching Mega go.        She turns for a final scowl, then exits. 68   EXT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER - EVENING X-Takk Troops sound alert. Outside the main portal, energy zaps and splinters above ground circuits, collecting to become: I-beem, reforming, running, stumbling.      Some body parts out of sync, catching up. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Halt!   State encryption code!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Breathless, he loses count.        Zaps beside himself.   Again:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Portal opens. 69   INT.   PLEXOR'S CPU PLEXOR You are positive Tron was destroyed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I observed it directly!     Rush turned Tron into vaporware! X-Takk Troops trade looks, impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush claims to be a User! He must be! He is awesomely skilled! Plexor hardens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Users do not exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is but a randomized Program, he got lucky. To our benefit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush and Krod were surrounded by stealth fighters! They were led by another User called Flynn!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn?? Plexor's circuitry strobes in dark troubled hues.         An image appears on his archive screen: Flynn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that's the one!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn... is here? He is the one behind this scheme to crash X-Net?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know where they are!     Rush and Krod need our help!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what of Mega?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We couldn't find her. I'm certain they captured her too! Plexor processes - his cranial circuits burn deep amber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tron is gone, but his User lives? Plexor turns to I-beem, grateful.        Removes I-beem's flimsy broken disk, studies it gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good work does not go unrewarded at X-Net. Would you like to be upgraded?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Plexor, very much so. Plexor energizes a REWARD PORTAL. Shimmering golden light beckons I-beem. He eagerly enters - and gets ZAPPED. I- beem emerges out the other side, a zombie-like X-Net Drone, joining a security crew. 70   INT.   PLEXOR'S INNER SANCTUM Plexor enters, raises his disk.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : RUSH rolls the BIG ROMBALL over:     A peace offering. Mega and Krod cautiously approach.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : D-Rezz raises his Romball to pulverize I-Beem. I-Beem freaks, ZAPS away in his data beam as Romball crashes down. I-Beem reforms further way, then beside them - He snatches his pancake disk, the zaps away again, emerging then high on the pile of parts.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: :    (2) Rush activates his light wand. LIGHT CYCLE up-rezzes under him, with a special two tier seat for a second rider.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Approaching cycle comes at 90 degree angle, turns hard, closes the distance. It's TRON.    Heartless eyes, ruthless moves. Rush turns quick, baiting Tron.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : I-beem de-rezzes into the grid, clearing the path. Rush and Krod taunt Tron into the trap... But, out of nowhere, Mega reaches to Rush's handlebars and turns 90 degrees too soon.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: RUSH WHY DID YOU DO THAT

dialogue.raw_text: .    ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM LABYRINTH Eaten away by memory leaks, like swiss cheese. Rush, Mega, Krod follow I-beem along narrow paths of unaffected material. Krod trips, his LIGHT WAND tumbles and skates into memory leakage. It FRIES and de-rezzes, sucked into the molten silicon swamp.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : His ankle.    He straightens, standing in front of D-rezz. Lays eyes on Tron.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: :    (2) But Mega looks dreadfully worried.     She slips away... Krod and I-beem climb down and help Rush to his feet.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: :    (5) Flynn yanks Tron's disk from Rush, peers over the precipice. Below, the last of Tron is consumed by memory leakage. Flynn ponders Tron's lifeless disk. He falters on his bad leg. Mega throws an arm around to help him stand. Melancholy energy courses between them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: GLEAMING NEW X-NET DATA OPTIK HIGHWAY

dialogue.raw_text: .   OLD DATA METROPLEX Vast, retro, multi-level.   Diverse and beautiful energy flows. Circular architecture. Flynn, Mega, Rush, Krod and Fighters come to a stunning view: GLEAMING NEW X-NET DATA OPTIK HIGHWAY is being constructed right through the heart of the city.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .   DOWNWARD PASSAGE - SECRET X-NET PROCESSOR Group moves along a catwalk, coming to a view of: X-Takks herd Captured Resistor Programs, lining them up for execution.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .   SECRET PASSAGE - CONTINUOUS Flynn hastens their journey.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : They arrive at a laser-barred JAIL BLOCK, where a dozen BIG X-Takk Troops are held prisoner.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: connects. 71   INT.   REAL WORLD - SINCLAIR'S OFFICE - NIGHT Sinclair paces amid a buzz of manic activity. TVs show news of escalating global data crashes. In comes a MARKETING VP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not going to believe this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Convince me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sales office has been flooded with calls. Major banks, airlines, city governments, the presidents of 26 nations - They all want to sign up for X-Net now. We're not even on- line yet and we're a hit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smirks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're the only port in the storm. Execs cheer, trade high-fives. Sinclair notices a blip on his private data screen. The office clears, doors shut.         Sinclair, alone now, interacts with his screen. Text: INTRUDER HAS BEEN ELIMINATED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brilliant. But:   THERE REMAINS AN AREA OF UNCERTAINTY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What uncertainy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 72   INT.   CYBERSPACE - PLEXOR'S INNER SANCTUM PLEXOR The User called Flynn is here. Sinclair reads the text, blind-sided.         Sees a photo of Flynn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's impossible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn commanded the intruder Tron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got to be wrong about this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was programmed error-free.      By you. Sinclair ponders the unimaginable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn...     escaped?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He leads a group who seek to prevent the opening of X-Net. The one called Rush has joined them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush? My guy? What lies has Flynn filled him with?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or what truths? Sinclair peers at the screen text, agitation growing. A news article pops up, recounting the lab accident and Flynn's "death". X-Net launch countdown ticks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This world can never know all I have done. You have a plan to contain Flynn?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't just contain him.    Destroy him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instructions received.    And the one called Rush? Sinclair mulls for two seconds, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He knows too much. Get rid of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instructions received. 73   INT.   JAIL BLOCK Rush and Krod get chummy with cell-mate X-Takks.     They mock- fight together, getting insider tips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And whatever you do, don't let them hit you here... Indicates a CIRCUIT NEXUS on his lower SPINE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All X-Net Programs have a weak spot there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hear that, Krod? Never let them get to your weak spot. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gurfle!   I never knew that. Pull back to see: Flynn secretly observes Rush.     Pondering.    Boole arrives behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're ready for you now. They head upstairs. 74   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT Flynn reviews Fighter training. Troops throw disks, battle in pairs, repair weapons, tweak armor circuitry. Flynn carries Tron's dark disk, contemplating it.       He moves past a line-up of his finest Fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If X-Net is allowed to open it's the beginning of the end of a free and open cyberspace. We can't let Plexor get away with this. Our game plan has not changed. Tron was specially programmed to break into X-Net and shut down power supplies. We would then exploit these weak points and cripple the system. Tron's role was essential One of you must take his place. He holds up Tron's disk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who among you can power Tron's disk and carry out his mission? All Fighters take a step forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the most dangerous job. If you're not up for it, nobody's going to blame you. All stand firm. Flynn lays Tron's disk in the first Fighter's hands. Fighter summons his will, causing the disk to glow faintly. But it soon goes dark again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are other ways to crash Plexor. I will return to him, he still trusts me. I will get close and crash him with direct contact -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's futile. Plexor's personal defense measures are massive. Other Fighters chime in, but they don't know what to do. A FIGHTER SENTRY dashes in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enemy scouts, headed this way! 75   INT.   JAIL BLOCK Rush, Krod and X-Tekk Prisoners heard COMMOTION in the main hideout area above. 76   EXT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM Phalanx of X-NET SECURITY CRUISERS moves in, mashing circuitry - X-TEKK TROOPS rowst Civilian Programs. Plexor commands LEAD CRUISER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disperse to all sectors! CRUISERS with X-Takks split in several directions. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The invader Tron crashed here. Plexor surveys the place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was a preferred gaming arena for the User called Flynn. His moves are predictable, recursive, easily traced. Plexor activates a Q-MINATOR. Device emits a PLANE of coherent pulsing energy, which scans the area, illuminates the RACING DATA BIT PATTERNS within all circuits, programs and surfaces. (An x-ray-like device that reveals all computer machine code underlying every cyberspace object.) A trail of code BURNS HOT NEON GREEN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That way! 80   EXT.   CLASSIC DATA HUB CITY X-Net Cruisers crash the city.      Programs scatter. Plexor commands Lead Cruiser, sweeps Q-MINATOR. Running Civilian Programs are rendered "naked" by the beam, bodies revealed as volumes of buzzing data bits "1010011101010110..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Down there. Cruisers deploy DE-REZZ BEAMS, slicing open structures. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fan out!    Search every buffer and cache!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!     Down here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get us out of here! 82   INT.   JAIL BLOCK AREA Plexor and X-Takks hustle down, finding: Rush, Krod and the X-Takk Prisoners, behind bars. X-Takk Specialists hack the system, power down jail bars. Prisoners step forth and retrieve their impounded disks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dude, are we glad to see you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You destroyed Tron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes...    Where is Mega?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's not with you? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's with Flynn!       I mean, totally
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn -!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn was smart enough to interrogate her first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She contains sensitive data. Flynn cannot be allowed to hack her. Rush and Krod notice: Behind Plexor and his Soldiers, BOOLE, QUANTZ and FINITY FIGHTERS move into position. They signal Rush and Krod not to blow their cover. Rush makes Krod comply. An ambush is ready to spring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, only -     We kicked Flynn's butt, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should have seen it.       Flynn won't be a problem. X-Takk Prisoners are confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then...   Why were you imprisoned?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ambush! Fighters POUNCE, throwing disks - Rush grabs a PROD LANCE, nails two X-Takks on their spinal nexus. They go down hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Delete them all! Plexor hurls an ENERGY BALL - Rush DUCKS, grazed by its FRACTAL comet trail. Fighters beat back Plexor.         His concerns shift.    He ducks into an ascension shaft - Rush and Krod are left fighting back-to-back, out-manned three-to-one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a TRAP! X-Takk Troops react, bolting for their Cruisers. Floor circuits ACTIVATE -     X-Takks ZAP and FREEZE. Fighters appear from all directions. Disks fly - X-Takks wield stout MAZER weapons - Even the corrupted Fighter Programs pitch in, working in clever teams, chipping away at Plexor's forces. But X-Takks have tougher armor and more awesome weapons. X-Takk Mazer cuts down Fighters by the dozen, leaving them corrupted or shut down. UPPER LEVEL: Flynn struggles to help wounded Fighters - He captures a Mazer and uses it against X-Takks... But Flynn can't move well on his bad leg. He watches his troops getting trounced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Retreat! Over that way!     Move around their flank! ZAP!   A Mazer blast strikes Flynn's bad leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arrrgghhh! Mega appears, throws her disk with deadly accuracy. The offending X-Takk Soldier crashes. Millions of bits spray over main arena - fractal fireworks. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They make for a bridge. Flynn slaps a wall panel.       Trigger circuit activates, surging down into... 85   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT MAIN ARENA ...Circuit energizes a sector of floor circuits, which overload and BLAZE - frying twenty X-Takks. 86   INT.   JAIL BLOCK AREA Rush and Krod use puny PROD LANCES against fearsome X-Takks... Rush charges an X-Takk dude, Krod gets cornered by another. Rush dodges his death blow, spine-zapping his foe... Krod prepares to die, as X-Takk Bully pins him with a Mazer and squeezes the trigger. X-Takk Bully seizes, freezes, crashes. Mazer barrel falls away from Krod - he's lucky to be alive. Rush stows Zap Wand, grabs Mazer and yanks Krod to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll never let you forget it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush, we're screwed!    Now everybody's after us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, we're cool. We're with them! Boole and Quantz sweep past, gathering Rush and Krod into their unit. They charge up the ascension shaft. 87   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT / MAIN HALL Plexor hurls DEATH DISK, takes out Fighters. He spins, looks up: Glimpses Flynn and Mega running along a ledge. He heads after them, working his way upward. 88   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT / MAIN HALL Rush and Krod emerge behind an X-Takk Cruiser. They knock out two X-Takk Soldiers, steal their MAZER WEAPONS. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awesome!    Can I do one? Rush spots Plexor heading to upper levels.         He pursues. 89   INT.    FIGHTER HIDE-OUT / UPPER LEDGE Flynn and Mega help corrupted Fighters toward the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quick.     This way. WHAM! A wounded Fighter is struck down. Triangular DEATH DISK swings wide, takes out another, then the last... Mega and Flynn spin to see: Plexor steps forward, retrieving his Death Disk.         Blocking their exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega, move aside! I will finish him! Instead, she shields Flynn's body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strike us down. There will always be more to oppose you. Sinclair's circuits snap with rage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What programming has he installed in you??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn!   Go with the others!   Run!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not leaving you with this phreak. Plexor brings back his DEATH DISK. In the shadows: Rush, creeping along the periphery, gaining position on Plexor. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor, get over the control thing. Plexor readies his disk to FIRE -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop the disk! He pivots, hurls Death Disk at Rush. Rush dives clear, sends his data energy into surrounding circuits. Circuits activate around Plexor, surging PAIN DATA into his body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be damned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush?! But Plexor resists Rush's data infusion, freezing the circuits around his feet. Cutting off the flow. Death Disk slices walls, arcing back toward Plexor - Rush LEAPS at Plexor. BLANG! Plexor is solid-state, like a cast iron statue.    Rush flips airborne, goes down hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Plexor considers Rush, astonished by his audacity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that all you've got? It's a millisecond's distraction - Death Disk returns to Plexor's hand, but swings wide and GRAZES his ARM, leaving a swath of painful CORRUPTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raagghh! X-Takks hustle in with hefty NEGABYTE BLASTERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush!    This way! Flynn, Mega and Flynn dash across the bridge. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Delete them! NEGABYTE BEAMS slice walls, erasing all data in their path. Rush, Flynn and Mega dive into a tunnel, escaping by inches. 90   EXT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT / DATA PIPE Rush, Mega and Flynn, pursued, rendezvous with Krod, Boole and Quantz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way!   Down the pipe! Rush helps Krod, Quantz and Boole into a data pipe.       One by one, they WHIRL away in the flow of chromatic data. Flynn and Mega have a breathless moment to consider Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's better than I thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's been sent for a reason.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What reason?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't know yet. Sometimes we have to trust the bigger plan. Mega struggles to compute. Rush turns to help Flynn down the pipe. Mega assists. Flynn's wounded leg gives out, he slips. Rush holds him, but loses his balance, slides down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega!   Quick! Jump! But she hesitates - VELCRONIC BEAMS snag her from behind - pulling her back onto the ledge. Rush tumbles down the flume, glancing back to see: Mega, hauled away by X-Takk Troops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got her! Mega stands defiant. Plexor regards her sternly. Extends his hand to her shoulder, cupping the back of her neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You committed a fatal error. DATA ENERGY SURGES from his eyes, flushing her body circuits. She fights intensifying input, but soon weakens. She glitches and shuts down, falling into the arms of X-Takks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Their strategies and tactics lie encrypted in her memory. Bring her! I will hack from her what I need. 92   INT.   DATA PIPE NETWORK Flynn leads the way, surfing the chromatic hyper-speed flow with Quantz and Boole. Rush and Krod struggle to master the technique, rolling, slipping, recovering, grabbing each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got it, I got it, I got it. Boole surfs around them, heading into a squirrely curve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Krod swings high, out of control.     Dumps in front of Rush, who flips him upright. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shove it!    Go! Rush and Krod swerve and gathers speed, shooting past Quantz, Boole and Flynn - pivoting to surf BACKWARDS!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember now! Nothing to it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check it out! Rush flips up and surfs on his hands.       Krod attempts to match the move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Rush and Krod crane around to see: DATA PIPE spills into a massive DATA FLUME.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AHHHHHHHH! 93   EXT.   DATA FLUME Rush and Krod plummet into surging hot data, out of control. Flynn and Fighters expertly surf huge waves. 94   EXT.   DATA BUFFER SHORE Flynn, Boole and Quantz drag Rush and Krod from data shallows. Everyone's circuits are hot and overloaded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm cool.    Not a problem. They let him go him go.       Krod glitches, collapses. Rush gets to his feet, head spinning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They took Mega. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She can handle herself for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we attack Plexor next? Flynn sizes up his new convert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're with us now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know hard it is?   Opposing the power of Plexor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's like the forty-sixth level of ConquerDome 6.1, while winning a side game of Tetras Ultra, doing six Instant messages and debugging a demo. Boole, Quantz and Krod are confused, but Flynn gets it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All at the same time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm there.   Krod too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say what? Flynn accepts a handshake from Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to need all the help we can get. Boole, can we make it to the dark zone from here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is one possible route.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll meet up with the code monkeys and combine forces. 95   EXT.   TRANSITION INTO DARK ZONE Group sets out across a vast region of unpowered circuitry.
