direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hordes of Captured Programs are lined up for termination. Among them: Wounded Fighters from the hide-out raid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We gave it everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Interface.   We can resist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Interface. They move close, holding each other.     X-Takks FIRE.    De-rezz beams zap them to bits. 97    INT.   REAL WORLD - NIGHT Computer Users react with frustration, as their programs crash (Users correspond in appearance to the Programs who just got zapped.) Web ads sell the virtues of X-Net. 98    INT.   REAL WORLD - FACTORY FLOOR - NIGHT Fire sprinklers fire off for no reason. Workers rush away, sprayed from above. Assembly line full of partially-assembled video recorders get dowsed with water. 99    INT.   REAL WORLD - AIRLINER COCKPIT - NIGHT Pilots react:   Navigational instruments glitch and fail. 100   INT.   REAL WORLD - SINCLAIR'S OFFICE - NIGHT X-Net sales rise higher, as TV news grows bleaker. Sinclair is distracted by a data file: News stories about the death of Flynn. The laboratory "accident". 101   EXT.   CYBERSPACE X-NET MAIN HIGHWAY - UNDER CONSTRUCTION Plexor. Lording over the grand-scale construction.        Sterile design, sleek lines, enormous capacity. X-Net Drone Workers assemble beams, girders, circuitry. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: X-Net OPTIK HIGHWAY NETWORK blasts through old systems and extends across cyberspace with alarming speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is completion on schedule?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On schedule. Plexor boards his Cruiser, which SPEEDS onto a completed stretch of X-Net OPTIK HIGHWAY. He's the only vehicle in sight, hogging a thousand brand-new lanes of data expressway. Plexor accelerates, relishing the thrill of unchecked power - 102   EXT.   X-NET ARTERIES - VARIOUS Plexor's Cruiser speeds through a new, as-yet unused X-Net switching station. It's heavily secured. X-Takk troops defer to their supreme leader. Plexor veers onto a proprietary side-route, bound for: 103   EXT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Firewall apertures cool, anticipating Plexor's arrival. Encryption portal opens. Plexor's Cruiser glides in. Portal closes. Firewalls reactivate, blazing red-hot, sealing the fortress. 104   INT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Towering corridors. Powerful armored X-Takk Guards stand in pairs at every portal, corner and column. Plexor strides past, steps into a special GATE. Data beams react with his circuitry. Encryption key resolves. Gate opens. 105   INT.   PROGRAMMING CHAMBER Plexor strides across the spare, sleek space. On a slab lies Mega, radiated from above by READER BEAMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor considers her glowing body circuits.          Studies emerging data patterns. Satisfied, he halts the process.        Beams go dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boot up. Mega awakens, sits up.      She sees the device, then Plexor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You treat me like I've been corrupted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cannot predict the random effects Flynn might have caused in you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You programmed me to gather intelligence. That's all I've ever done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long have you known Flynn?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough time to gain his trust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your behavior was highly authentic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To him.    It had to be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you allowed Flynn to complete a full interface with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am programmed to allow such access only to you, Plexor. Her eyes lock on him.      He is satisfied.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn claims to be a User.     As did the one called Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Users do not exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have seen nothing to make you doubt this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They possess no powers beyond those of routine Programs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no knowledge of such powers. She steps down.     They walk out of the chamber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still, there is something about them I cannot compute. Flynn plans to attack me, doesn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. And Rush will fight by his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where will they strike?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn does not decide until the hour of his attack. But he trusts me completely. When he knows the place, I will know it as well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect. They will be met with a final thrashing. Yes, let them come. They pass through the gate, arrive in the corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you further instructions for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None for now. But stay close. They lock gazes.     Barcode data surges between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came to me full of glitches and random routines. Look at you now. What an extraordinary piece of programming I have made of you. I created X-Net to the same standard of flawless beauty. Soon, its perfection will become all that is, and all that ever will be. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All events remain under your control. With a smirk and a final jolt of data, Plexor leaves her. 106   INT.   PLEXOR'S CPU Plexor crosses into his inner sanctum. Raises his disk, initiates RUBY BEAM link with Sinclair. Mega appears on a balcony above, in the shadows, secretly observing Plexor. 107   EXT.   DARK ZONE Howling, barren, dim.      Circuitry left unpowered for eons. Rush and Krod follow Flynn and Fighters, into treacherous canyons, across vast planes. Rush hears something and pulls the group behind cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over there! Three massive X-NET X-PORTER VEHICLES rumble by. Imprisoned in the rear are hundreds of Programs. Cruisers blast a path through mountains and speed away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those Programs think they're just being transferred!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we take out those X-Net guys?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our forces are too thin. We can't risk a battle that would reveal this position. From another direction appear two Code Monkey Programs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn!   Down here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !    JR!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn!   Enter. We configured a base. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good to see you guys. When did the X-Net goons start patrolling all the way out here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're everywhere now. Taking all Programs by force.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come.   There is much to report! They head down into: 108   INT.   LAST FIGHTER CACHE Deteriorating silicon lattice.     Flynn, Rush, Krod and Fighters arrive to a meager encampment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Greetings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey guys. This is Rush and his main man Krod. They defected from Plexor's forces to fight with us. A buzz of hope penetrates gloom.       Nobody has defected from Plexor before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We made progress decoding X-Net's power supply encryption.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excellent.   Let's see. In a make-shift lab, CODE MONKEYS demonstrate, working at mind-boggling speed, assembling a small intricate HOLOGON DEVICE (conical pyramid-shaped encryption key).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen that somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the encryption pattern on Plexor's disk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good eyes. We've got Mole Programs who score chunks of Plexor's personal code anywhere they can find it. These guys fit the pieces together. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It can take a quadrillion combinations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We just snagged the last piece, but the battle cost us big time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many of you crashed? Heads shake somberly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Teraflop Boys?     Algebrat?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All that survive, you see standing here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Geez. Flynn falters on his bad leg.       Quantz and Boole support him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time is running out! Rush approaches Code monkeys as they toil blur-speed, trying to fit the final code piece - a flat square. Pyramidal HOLOGON looks exactly like the X-Net desk toy we saw in Rush's cubicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yow. I get tired just watching these dudes. Rush sees:    Compilers try to fit the square inside the pyramid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just for laughs, try putting the circle on top of the pyramid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's incongruous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'm wrong, ding me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What have we got to lose?    Try it. Code Monkeys place the square on top of the pyramid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bingo. Square spins into a circle, latches and LIGHTS the entire Hologon lattice. Intricate 3D code patterns ANIMATES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good thing you didn't terminate us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we use this thing to shut down Plexor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a copy of Plexor's master key. We can break into any X-Net facility and fry the power supply.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But once Plexor knows we have it, he'll change the code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep.   We've got one shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we should take out the power supply to Plexor's main server.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Take out Plexor's central server!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on, guys, that's not as easy as it sounds -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was inside the main server, I saw how it's laid out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to work there!   I'll recognize where everything is!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can take it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hit Plexor where he lives! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even with this key, it won't -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can pull it off, can't we Flynn? One final assault on Plexor's central server?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut him down forever? All eyes on Flynn.    Rush's naivete has ignited false hope in the Fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course we can. Flynn forces a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, the future depends on us.    How could we fail? 109   INT.   ENCOM ADVANCED RESEARCH LAB - MOMENTS LATER Sinclair comes off the secured elevator, finds Meg and Dewey at work on Quantum Digitizer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's almost fixed. I'll be able to bring back Rush soon -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excellent work. Unfortunately, I'm shutting down this project.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something came up. The company is at stake. I can't go into details.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Rush would have no way to return!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meg. I will never hold you responsible. This is a tough call, but it's mine. Dismantle and destroy all of this equipment and software. Immediately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meg...   I'm not asking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand. He shoots a look and exits. 110   EXT.   CYBERSPACE - X-NET OPTIK HIGHWAY OVER DARK ZONE Compiler Crews work at megahertz speed. OPTIK HIGHWAYS extend and converge. Switching stations assemble. Crews shift to new assignments. Pull wide to see dismal ground below.    Dark zone, emitting woeful blips of random energy. Pillars descend from X-Net crews above and SMASH into the old silicon, planting themselves deep and impervious. Rush stands on a vista point, aghast as X-Net construction dominates the landscape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a bummer being on the losing team, huh Rush? Flynn sits nearby, trying to patch his corrupted leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll trash X-Net. Then we'll go back to the our world and expose what Sinclair's done. He looks at Krod, Boole, Quantz and Code Monkeys in the distance, preparing for battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do they have any idea our world exists? Do they understand what a User is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Programs once connected freely with their Users. But Plexor shut down the I/O ports, severing all links. He controls all contact with the world we once knew. Programs operate on his instructions or none at all. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's nothing to brag about.    We're getting our butts kicked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It there a way to contact Meg? She can transport us back to our world. Maybe it's better if we fight Sinclair on his own turf. Flynn lays a somber gaze on his eager Fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave up the idea of going back a long time ago... You should too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sinclair didn't get where he is by being dumb. Even if we survive Plexor's forces in here, Sinclair will make sure we never get back home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...   Meg said -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure she'll do everything she can. It might not be enough. Flynn removes a cover-plate from his leg, trying to hide the damage from Rush. Suspicious, Rush pulls the plate aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man. Flynn's data corruption has worsened. His leg throbs with the drab glow of irreversible MEMORY DRAIN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you tell anyone it was this bad? Flynn looks at his leg.     Then at Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush. I think Meg suspects the truth about Sinclair. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's why she sent you here. She knew you're the one guy who could find out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought she hated me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She believed in you more than you believed in yourself. It sinks in.    Wow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we really have a shot at winning against Plexor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have his master key. And we have Mega working on the inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega... Are you sure about her? I get the feeling she plays both sides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plexor programmed her to perform his will. He's a control freak. I'm not. I programmed her to have a will of her own. Whatever she decides, it's up to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometimes you've got to trust the bigger plan. Krod and Fighters approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready to rock and roll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guys... Rush is right about our final attack. If we've only got one shot, we should go for Plexor's central server. If we insert the hologon key in the main power supply, we can trigger a meltdown. Plexor will be have his best troops standing in our way. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Getting past them was the ultimate task I programmed Tron to carry out. He takes up Tron's dark disk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I turbo-charged him to burn hot and burn fast. Who else could handle the operating code in this disk? He extends the disk to Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uhhh, I don't think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It could mean the difference between winning and losing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I'll try. Rush holds off Krod, takes the disk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do I do - ? Waves of Rush's DATA ENERGY surge into disk circuitry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yow! He buckles and shakes.    Hands zapping.    Knees trembling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steady. It's all about giving as much as you get. Let it become a part of you. Rush clenches teeth, concentrates.     Grips the disk. Energy surges back and forth, up Rush's arms, around the disk. He holds tight, ready to scream -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awesome, dude! Don't let go! Fighters are amazed, as TRON'S DISK POWERS UP - And RUSH'S body circuits DAZZLE in the ruby circuitry patterns of TRON. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn, look at that...     He did it. Rush looks at his arms, astounded. His circuitry strobes in hues of brilliant red. Disk animates and unfolds, revealing infinite surface variations. Rush feels new power surging inside his body. His eyes harden, keen like Tron's. Rush LEAPS BACKWARD, goes airborne, lands on a ledge high above. Amazing balance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: YES!   Excellent move, dude!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It feels...    Awesome. Rush's voice is a little deeper, with a digital edge.       It surprises him. He cocks his disk and THROWS. Disk rockets across the landscape, a mile away and STRIKES an X-NET SURVEY POST, blasting it to bits. Disk arcs high, shoots back toward Rush. Rush looks worried for a second, ready to duck -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't flinch, Rush!   It's your disk now. Disk snaps back into Rush's hand, painlessly.       Throbbing with energy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh man, this is good. Rush pulls a new LIGHT WAND from a thigh bracket. It extends into a hundred-foot vaulting pole. Rush VAULTS across the canyon, lands with precision. Light pole retracts into the wand in a nanosecond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awwwww!   Where can I get one of those? Another two vaults and a leap - Rush tosses his disk into a spiral, steps off it mid-air (like stairs), and lands perfectly - rejoining the group. Cheers from Krod, Quantz, Boole and Code Monkeys.       Flynn shakes Rush's hand - energy surges between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's for real, Quantz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got a chance to take down Plexor. 111   INT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER - MAIN HALL Plexor reviews a line of elite X-Takks. All are decked in thick battle gear, gripping an array of menacing ultra-tech weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect. Any three of you could crash an army of Flynn's best. But I've prepare for his random acts by designing massive redundancy. Widen to reveal: BATTALION of X-Takks, lined in precise rows, filling the vast hall. Since Adolf Hitler, no one has displayed such an awesome military machine. 112   INT.   PLEXOR'S INNER SANCTUM Mega sneaks in, alone. She pulls her disk off her back and raises it above her head. Data energizes around her. She clenches hard, trying to make the connection. A RUBY BEAM converges off her disk, reaching skyward. 113   INT.   REAL WORLD - ENCOM ADVANCED RESEARCH LAB - NIGHT Meg and Dewey work to dismantle the lab. Meg walks past, stops. Comes back.      Reads fresh text on a computer screen: DOES MEG EXIST?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dewey.   This your idea of a joke? 114   INT.   CYBERSPACE - X-NET CENTRAL SERVER - MAIN HALL PLEXOR Cybavor programming complete?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Demonstrate. X-Net Specialists drops the sides on a cubic cage. A frozen dog-like CYBAVOR CREATURE stands like a statue. Plexor nods.    X-Net Specialist activates. Cybavor comes alive.     Circuits RAGING.    Eyes pulsing. Plexor summons an X-Net Worker Drone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Install yourself over there. Worker Drone does as he's told.       He freezes in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Attack! Cybavor leaps like a hyena, bounds the length of the hall. DIVES at the Worker Drone... And DEVOURS HIM mercilessly. Energy sparks fly, circuits zap, as the Cybavor digest the energy, GROWS LARGER, then SPLITS DOWN THE MIDDLE (like DNA), then regrows the missing halves. Now the Cybavor is a PAIR of nasty, snarling Cybavors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: End routine. Cybavors sit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elegant. Surveying his perfect defenses, he notices one thing missing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is Mega?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only you are authorized to monitor her coordinates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Download forces. Await my command.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Download!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: X-Takks file out in perfect lines, turn perfect corners, dispersing into the compound. Each one moves in exactly the same way. Plexor turns sharply to exit, encountering...      Mega.    Standing there obediently. 115   EXT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER On the fortress perimeter, X-Takks stand watch at the base of a deep security moat. They turn, eyes scanning. Behind them, a LIGHT POLE extends into the canyon, then swings across. It's "tronified" Rush, using his vaulting pole to ferry Fighters across the moat edges. He returns to the far side, landing momentarily on a lone central pinnacle to make the distance. Rush vaults back to gather Krod, who's the last to cross.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't take this the wrong way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't drop me. He hugs Krod and vaults them across.    Krod clings and struggles, then YELPS - X-Takks hear and scan the pinnacle and moat edges. On top of the pinnacle, Rush and Krod hunker.      Flynn signals from the far side "stay down!" X-Takks patrol below, pausing to gaze up. Atop the pinnacle, Krod's circuits energy-zap with fear. Rush holds him down. At last, X-Takks move on. Rush extends his light pole to the moat floor - vaults to the far side with Krod. Krod stabilizes, looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I recognize this place.    I know where everything is!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He heads off, encounters a dead end.       Quantz pulls him the right way. 116   EXT.   DATA NEXUS / CENTRAL SERVER PERIPHERY Boole and Code Monk B3t help Flynn to a secluded data buffer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush, up there. See it? Rush leaps to a high circuitry nexus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you're right about Mega. Rush touches circuitry, energizing it with data. Mega's image appears in circuitry energy patterns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You.     Where is Flynn?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're all here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I arranged for your entry. An encryption portal has been left unlocked. Path 4786324BXY. Do you know the way? Rush looks down to Code Monk J2r.       He gives a high sign. 117   INT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER / CIRCUITRY Mega watches glowing circuity image of Rush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry. She deactivates.       Rush's image vanishes. Mega thinks for a moment - we're not sure what - then walks around a corner. Bumps smack into: Plexor. Flanked by his two snarling Cybavors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You contacted them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave them the portal address. They will attempt entry soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect.    We will be waiting. 118   EXT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Patrols of X-Takks pass. Rush leaps to a vantage point them. Scouts a route, signals Flynn, Krod, Boole, Quantz and the Code Monkeys. Fighter team scales a narrow ledge near the BLAZING FIREWALL. It's like a sheet of molten lead, pouring endlessly before them. A lethal barrier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is all yours, Rush. Rush pulls his disk, holds it over his head and steps under the molten data flow. He struggles against raw power, disk HEATS UP WHITE, splashing aside the molten data.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go!    Quick! Code Monkeys, Flynn and Krod, Quantz and Boole dive between Rush's legs, emerging on the other side. Barrier overcome. Rush leaps out of the firewall, clutching his white-hot disk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No sweat. (to himself)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That way to the portal!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They head for the fortress along a surreptitious route, avoiding X-Takk patrols. 119   INT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Plexor - with Mega and the Cybavors two paces behind - leads an army of X-Takks. A Cybavor growls at Mega.          She growls back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There it is.     That's the portal. Plexor masses his forces around a closed ENCRYPTION PORTAL. It is a dark semispheric aperture, left unlocked (but closed).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Converge on all levels! Outside patrols close in behind these coordinates! X-Takks come from all directions, all levels. 120   EXT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Flynn pauses to see X-Net Patrols in motion, across bridges, through tunnels. All around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep moving. They come to a dark encryption portal, seen from their exterior view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Portal 4786324BXY.       This is it. Flynn withdraws the HOLOGON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sooner Rush gets this into the main power supply, the sooner X-Net shuts down. And the more of us come out of here to tell about it. Rush takes the hologon, stows it. Pumped looks between Code Monkeys, Boole and Quantz.           Krod trembles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh man, I think I'm leaking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Krod.   You'll do great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Think so?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your recognize patterns better than any of us. You'll know Plexor's moves before he does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope you're right...     Rush?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you really a "User"? Is there such a thing? Is that what makes you so good? All Programs hang on Rush's answer.         Flynn too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn and I come from a realm no better or worse than here... One thing I know, neither place works unless you're looking out for the other guy. And we've got a word for what all of you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Obsolete?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heroes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's do it. Fighters hustle under the shadow of the portal...        Approaching the closed semispheric aperture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: X-Takks stand thick, weapons pointed at the closed aperture. Plexor marks time.    Cybavors poise to attack. Mega, emotions rising, takes a step back. 122   EXT.   DARK PORTAL Flynn falters on his wounded leg.     Fighters steady him. Rush steps forward, places a hand on the semispheric aperture. Mechanism activates. 123   INT.   PORTAL Plexor tenses, eager for the slaughter. X-Takks cock weapons, take careful aim. 124   INT.   DARK PORTAL Flynn, Code Monkeys, Quantz, Boole, Krod...       Gathering near Rush - PORTAL OPENS AROUND THEM, revealing a stunning view of: The inside of the fortress... Not an X-Takk in sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing to it. Rush leads group inside. 125   INT.   "EXECUTION PORTAL" Plexor grows impatient.     Senses trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !   OPEN FIRE! X-Net Specialist activates portal.     Semispheric aperture irises open to reveal: X-Takk Patrol.   Charging in from outside. No fighters in sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Inside-X-Takks and outside-X-Takks take orders literally: They FIRE at EACH OTHER.      Many crash, zap and fizzle. Cybavors leap in, devouring corrupted X-Takks. The two Cybavors use energy "food" to bifurcate into FOUR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! They do so, instantly. Plexor fumes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been tricked! He spins to find Mega gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mega has betrayed me for the last time! She is with the fighters! Find them! CRASH THEM ALL! 126   INT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER Mega RUNS from the scene. Around a corner, she collides with Rush, Flynn, Krod & Fighters. Breathless:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn!   Keep moving!    This way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm proud of you, Mega.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I linked with MEG.     Users exist. She instructed me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, Meg! She glances over the new "tronified" Rush. Despite herself, she's impressed. But there's no time for talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which way to the power supply?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ummmm... That way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush leaps to a high ledge to confirm: Massive throbbing power supply CORE CUBE lies at the center of the fortress's concentric squares. High sign to Krod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right! There it is!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And here they come! Rumble precedes:    ARMY of X-Takks, coming to get them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Break out the toys! X-Takks are upon them, and the battle is joined. X-Net disks fly by the hundreds. Krod and Code Monkeys fire a SQRAM projectile, which opens mid-air into a super-wide circular magnetic field "net". SQRAM field sucks in X-Net disk and zaps them to ash. X-Takks charge. Rush flips down from above, throws tron-disk - Disk ricochets of ten X-Takks, mows them down. Rush retrieves his disk, lands near Krod and Fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Block this choke point, slow them down. Can you guys do it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a problem. He throws his disk behind his back, takes out an approaching X-Net goon. Rush hurries away with Mega and Flynn. Krod, Quantz, Boole and Code Monkeys are besieged by a hundred X-Takks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Retreat! That way!     Keep firing! RUN! AHHH! Plexor enters the battle arena with his four CYBAVORS.     He scans keenly, then heads off another direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn hobbles, helped by Mega.     Rush leads them around a corner, in sight of: MAIN POWER SUPPLY.     Massive reactive CORE CONTAINMENT CUBE. Rush comes to the edge of a deep, narrow moat. Bottom is      a channel of ROILING, MOLTEN CHROMATIC DATA. No bridges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to get across. RAAAA!!! Six X-Takks are upon them, disks flying, NegaByte eraser beams swinging. Flynn Takes a hit in the chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Rush and Mega dodge, fling their disks with lethal accuracy - X-Takks crash and fall, tumbling into the moat abyss, flashing as they hit the molten bottom. 128   INT.   X-NET CENTRAL SERVER CORRIDORS Krod, Boole and Quantz bait a phalanx of X-Takks, Code Monkeys spring a DEGAUSSING CHARGE, which cuts off a column at the base. Column tumbles, crashing X-Takks, blocking the way. High fives among Krod and Fighters. One Small X-Takk breaks through, ZAPPING through the air, reforming, ZAPPING CLOSER. Fighters turn to blast him. But Krod recognizes the pattern:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!     I know that dude! Quantz stuns an X-Takk Soldier - Code Monkeys hack his X-Net Armor. Armor powers down, revealing:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I-beem! I-beem shakes off his brainwashing. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Krod my friend! Who are these guys?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're taking out Plexor.    You with us or them? X-Takks attack the group, including I-beem. I-beem zaps away, reappearing next to an X-Takk. He steals the X-Takk's NEGABYTE BLASTER and mows down three X-Takks, saving trapped Boole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With you! I-beem joins Fighters as they press deeper, engaging the next X-Takk onslaught. 129   INT.   X-NET POWER SUPPLY OUTER GANTRY - CONTINUOUS Rush and Mega haul Flynn along a narrow ledge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There.   You can make it across! He points to a thin ledge on the other side, far below. Rush extends his Light Pole to the ledge, moves to gather Flynn for a vault-crossing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, take Mega! I'll stay here and run interference.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You haven't got a chance by yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, these guys are wimps. It's bravado: They know his odds are dismal. Flynn slumps into an alcove, which is only big enough for him. He pulls a supply of SPIKED MINI-DISKS, ready to defend himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not leaving you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My body is weak, but my will is strong. I promise, no matter what they do to me, I'll survive this. Trust the bigger plan. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's fading fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Flynn - X-Takks attack along the ledge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !   NOW! Rush throws his arm around Mega and VAULTS across the moat, landing on the far side - gaining a slim foot-hold below a core ENTRY POINT. Flynn chooses his moment, leans out and throws. His mini disks take out X-Takks on the ledge. Their bodies tumble into the moat, flashing as they hit. Flynn spins, the wall behind him opens.       At the end of a square corridor stands: PLEXOR.   Flanked by his four snarling Cybavor beasts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flynn. Your moment of obsolescence is upon you. Across the moat, Rush and Mega climb to the entry point. Flynn plays for time, stalling Plexor so he doesn't catch sight of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Freedom, Plexor. It's the better idea. That's why Mega chose my side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If an idea is erased from all memory banks, it can be neither good nor bad. When each alternative has been removed, X-Net will simply BE. With a hand signal, he commands his Cybavors.         They raise up, poised to attack Flynn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crash me. Hack me. Do what you want. The yearning for freedom will last forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice speech... USER! He flicks a finger.       Cybavors gallop at Flynn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rush and Mega gain footing at the entry point.      They turn at the sound of DIGITAL SNARLING. Across the moat, a gut-wrenching sight: All four Cybavors pounce on Flynn, hurling him off the ledge, mauling him as they go down, dividing into eight - Plummeting toward the MOLTEN DATA far below. Plexor steps out of his corridor, relishing the view:      Remains of fallen bodies FLASH into the inferno.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Noooooo!!! Plexor sees Mega and Rush on the other side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over there!    Surround them! Bridges instantly extend from outer square to CORE CUBE. X-Takks stream across, firing - 131   INT.   POWER SUPPLY CORE CUBE Rush and Mega duck inside entry point, pelted by disks. Before them: A vast, brilliant, energized LATTICE. Power surges in rings, drawing down huge columns. Every piece of geometry is based on perfect squares, made of mirror-finished rare earth elements. Rush pulls the HOLOGON KEY into view. Facets resonate with energy patterns like those in the core.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We plug this into the control cell, X-Net is history.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's do it for Flynn. They share a heartbeat of solidarity.      Rivalry gone. X-Takks stream in, firing. Rush and Mega charge the center, throwing disks, fighting back-to-back. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Problem is, ENERGY RINGS move continuously down the columns - and the columns are spaced close - leaving just enough time between ring-passes to jump through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He and Mega JUMP, nearly raked by down-flowing ENERGY RINGS. X-Takks fire NEGABYTE BLASTERS - but many of the beams are caught in the energy flow and sucked away. That's how intense this place is. X-Takk Soldier is grazed, stumbles into ENERGY COLUMN. RING rakes down and ZAPS him nasty - reducing him to bits, sucking his energy to the levels below. Rush and Mega encounter oncoming X-Takks - they must split up. They fling disks, taking out X-Takks, dodging fire - working their way deeper. Meg and Rush throw their disks simultaneously.     Both disks score hits, then arc to return. Rush and Mega catch each other's disk. They each look at the strange disks - it's just not the same. The do a quick swap and keep fighting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over there! The CONTROL CELL.    Dead center. 132   INT.   CONTROL CELL CHAMBER Rush and Mega battle off three X-Takks - the way is clear. Rush leaps, crashes planes of silicon.     Stows his disk, pulls out the HOLOGON. Spots the control cell's key receptacle - SHAPES MATCH. Rush moves to insert the hologon. A DISK STRIKES his arm - HOLOGON flies wild.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! PLEXOR drops from above, riding an OPTIK SHAFT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get that?!   No one knows this code but me! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your software has the biggest flaw there is, Plexor. You can't see you own mistakes. Plexor snatches his Death-disk, corners Rush for the kill. Mega's disk crashes silicon, comes at Plexor - But his defense field repels it. He slams it aside and it's raked away by downward flowing energy rings. Rush DIVES at PLEXOR. He's like a statue. But this time RUSH holds him and infuses tron-energy, breaking down Plexor's defense field, eating into his body circuits. It's fractal zapping fireworks - evenly matched foes battling face-to- face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it Mega! Mega scoops HOLOGON off floor, makes for CONTROL CELL - Plexor's hand shoots out, GRABS HER, stops her like iron. Plexor exerts his power, holds Rush and Mega by the throats with his two hands, backing them toward a surface ripping with HOT ENERGY RINGS. Rush and Mega struggle, an inch from death - ZAAAAAA - Plexor stops, annoyed.      Turns and sees: Krod, Fighters and I-beem have arrived, firing blasters at Plexor's SPINAL NEXUS. It hardly makes a dent, but it creates a fleeting opportunity for Rush - Rush ducks forward, SHOOTS his disk off his back, smacking Plexor in the throat. Mega falls clear - Rush hurls Plexor against energy rings - Energy rakes down his body, but he fights the effects an DOES NOT MELT DOWN. He step away, shakes off the damage, retrieves his disk into a hand. Mega snags the hologon -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! She tosses it to Rush, who's already airborne - Rush catches hologon, sails to the control unit -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jams hologon into its receptacle. Plexor cocks his death disk, EYES FLASH ELECTRO-PSYCHOSIS - Hologon REACTS with CENTRAL CELL - Shockwaves RADIATE - Energy rings go dim, then dark - Silicon shatters to ash - X-Takks power down. X-Net armor de-rezzes, leaving innocent civilian Programs. They shake off the mind-control and rise unshackled. And Plexor, like all things X-Net, chatters and glitches. His code erodes, his bits darken, the fiber of his being erodes from inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now who's obsolete? Rush executes a final leap, extending his feet for the final blow, straight at Plexor - CRASH - shattering him to bits. Rush finally breathes.       Sees I-beem, Krod, Quantz, Boole, Code Monkeys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks guys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll never let you forget it. Boole tosses Rush his tron-disk. 133   EXT.   CYBERSPACE VISTA POINT Rush, Mega, Krod, I-beem, Fighters and liberated Programs stow disks and step to a high vantage point. Before them expands a vista of cyberspace. Power-down of X-Net radiates in all directions, leaving everything else intact. Beautiful, exotic old data networks instantly begin to regenerate into the open space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're free.     At last we're free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sinclair commands the podium:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In a world exposed to increasing data corruption, I hereby switch on the first global network offering
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THERE REMAINS AN AREA OF UNCERTAINTY

dialogue.raw_text: : Krod twists around, playing with his spinal nexus.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Next Fighter holds the disk, bearing down, animating the circuits... But he buckles and the disk falls dims. Mega worries: One-by-one, Fighters fail to power Tron's disk. Flynn reaches the end of the line. Mega puts her hands out to receive the disk. Flynn hesitates, then hands her Tron's disk. Mega clenches it, concentrating deeply. Her energy infuses the disk, animating its circuits stronger than anyone. Bur soon, her eyes strobe, her body circuits overload. She lets go.    Tron's disk thunks the floor, goes dark. Mega hardens her resolve.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: EXT.
location: ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM / OLD GAME GRID CRUISERS

dialogue.raw_text: : X-Takk Squads crash fleeing programs. 77   EXT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM / OLD GAME GRID CRUISERS with X-Takk Troops ravage grid, moving into: 78   EXT.   MEMORY LEAK TUNNELS X-Net CRUISERS crash through. ASSEMBLER UNITS spew freshly programmed BRIDGES over memory leak swamps. X-Takk troops hustle deeper. 79   INT.   ANCIENT COMPUTER SYSTEM LABYRINTH X-Takks storm in. Specialized units scan memory leaks, detect code fragments - schematic images of Tron.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Flashing bitstorm, screaming Civilian Programs -     The wrath of X-Net is unleashed upon the city. 81   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT CRASH! Walls slice and crumble - X-NET CRUISERS blast their way in, coming to a stop in precise formation. Plexor emerges from Lead Cruiser. Stops.   Looks. The place is empty. Not a fighter in sight.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: .   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT ASCENSION SHAFT Plexor races upward, but is blocked by a unit of Fighters. Plexor pulls off his special TRIANGULAR DEATH DISK - FLINGS it. Disk ricochets off three Fighters, knocking them out. Another lethal fling and the remains Fighters fall. Plexor retrieves his death-disk with heart-stopping accuracy, darts into: 84   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT MAIN ARENA PLEXOR
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Fighter Specialists hustle in, attach ENCRYPTION PODS to the Cruiser. Data meltdown radiates from the key, "burning" through the Cruiser like paper. Cruiser implodes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : Fighters, Krod, Rush and Flynn surf down the data WHIRL, accelerating away from the hot zone. X-Takks jump in after them, but are all swallowed by the flow - gone. 91   INT.   FIGHTER HIDE-OUT / MAIN HALL Bashed and ruined, littered with fallen Fighters. Plexor nurses his injured arm, commanding the mop-up. X-Takks bring Mega to their leader.
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: EXT.
location: X-NET OPTIK HIGHWAY OVER DARK ZONE
